post.body: exactly!
I do, but in a family kind of way. Chemistry is chemistry. It's either there or it isn't.
That Yome would be perfect for burning man.
Good point. And we've bought them in the package and when we got home were disappointed.
Then you can decorate your Yome at IKEA. Wait, in the pics it looks like they already did.
Well now. That's a good idea. Let the toy stand on its own merit. No pun intended. Well okay, maybe just a little.
Love or stability? Love. You make stability. Love just happens.
Added. Add me back, baby.
They just follow the same old marketing formula they've always used.
Instead of pornstars. I've always wondered that too. I don't think anyone puts too much thought into it.
I agree. I think many women would prefer to use the toys with a partner.
I am!
Not being an oyster man, I have no real advice. Is there a Japanese sensual chef in the house?
I'm going to have to look that stuff up.
I can tell the temperature with amazing accuracy by the nipples of this young thing in my office.
Oyster, friend. Friend, oyster. };^)~
I think there is a huge market for it
Yes I did, and glad too. This thing is sweet.
Happy Birthday!
DOH!
he was talking about the Christmas Tree: "And now a Xmas tradition so Christian that it predates Christianity."
Happy Solstice. Great piece you wrote there. Did you hear Steven Colbert the other night talking about that?
Happy Yule. Blessed Be
people who do go outside their marriage without the knowledge and participation of their spouse do eventually regret it.
You are correct: people do not leave healthy and happy relationships, period.
I don't think most people are smart enough to know how to keep a relationship alive. Most have no idea how to communicate.
dating outside your marriage is only a recipe for disaster if everyone involved is not on board with it; ala cheating
Lmao. Well how many times has Billy Joel been married.
@ste_global Serious. Everyone put their clothes back on. The problem with newbies being at after parties.
}:^)~ Thanks!
Us either. Too cold, too muddy. The kids will be wanting to go home 10 minutes after we get there.
Not going to the Solstice Burn?
I KNEW IT!
It's the horns isn't it? I just had them trimmed.
Okay, off to bed for me. Another week of work ahead. Goodnight all.
19 deg outside and our furnance decides to be tempermental.
Okay. Home now. Left the party before the drunk jealousy started.
Okay, this party is getting fucked up by newbies that are in over their head.
